original_text: “But if he struck him down with an iron object, so that he died, he is a murderer. The murderer shall be put to death.
korean_text: 만일 철 연장으로 사람을 쳐죽이면 그는 살인자니 그 살인자를 반드시 죽일 것이요

sentences.original_text: But if he struck him down with an iron object,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그가 철 물건으로 그를 쳐서 쓰러뜨렸다면,

sentences.original_text: The murderer shall be put to death.
